title: What the ‘Cool Kids’ of Perfectly Imperfect Are Super Into
description: Perfectly Imperfect, a cult newsletter for downtown tastemakers, held a raucous party in Brooklyn.
dc:creator: Alex Hawgood
media:credit: Ye Fan for The New York Times
media:description: Fujifilm Instax photos of partygoers at the second anniversary party for Perfectly Imperfect, held at Baby’s All Right.
